channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 欧州のストリーミング配信会社SkyShowtimeのモンティ・サルハンCEOとのQ&A：安価な広告付きティアの追加、加入者数の非公開、支出の削減などについて（Georg Szalai/Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Georg Szalai / Hollywood Reporter:
Q&A with Monty Sarhan, CEO of European streamer SkyShowtime, on adding a cheaper ad-supported tier, not revealing subscriber numbers, cutting spending, and more  —  The European streaming joint venture of Comcast and Paramount is not cutting back because “the U.S. narrative is not our narrative …

item.title: アンペア分析：ディズニーは、148の望ましいタイトルの最大のライブラリーを持っており、パラマウント・グローバルの72がそれに続く。Netflixは、ディズニーにとって最高のライセンシング・パートナーになるだろう（David Satin/The Streamable）
item.description:
David Satin / The Streamable:
Ampere Analysis: Disney has the biggest library of desirable titles at 148, followed by Paramount Global's 72; Netflix would be Disney's best licensing partner  —  Disney's catalog contains the highest number of titles that other streamers might find desirable, according to new data from Ampere Analysis.

item.title: BBC Disinformation & Social Media Correspondent Marianna Springの著書『Among the Trolls』について、BBCのオンライン罵倒の80％の標的であること、その他についてのQ&A（Jude Rogers/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Jude Rogers / The Guardian:
Q&A with BBC Disinformation & Social Media Correspondent Marianna Spring on her book Among the Trolls, being the target of 80% of BBC's online abuse, and more  —  The broadcaster on dealing with abuse, the power of the Barbie movie, and watching Spurs with her dad

item.title: アップルによると、「Masters of the Air」はApple TV+のサービス開始以来最も視聴されたシリーズであり、サービス全体の視聴者数は前7日間と比較して全世界で65％増加した（J. Kim Murphy/Variety）
item.description:
J. Kim Murphy / Variety:
Apple says Masters of the Air was Apple TV+'s most-watched series launch ever and viewership across the service rose 65% globally vs. the prior seven-day period  —  Steven Spielberg's Amblin Television, Tom Hanks and Gary Goetzman produced the streamer's high-flying hit

item.title: HBOは『Last Week Tonight With John Oliver』のYouTubeへの投稿を、各エピソードの初回放送後数日間延期する。
item.description:
Rick Porter / The Hollywood Reporter:
HBO delays posting Last Week Tonight With John Oliver segments on YouTube for a few days after episodes premiere, to nudge more people to watch the show on Max  —  The delay in posting to the video site is intended to nudge more people to watch the show on Max.

item.title: 英国全国通信社協会がNews UKのフリーランス料金を40年間据え置いたと批判。
item.description:
Bron Maher / Press Gazette:
The UK's National Association of Press Agencies criticizes News UK for its freelance rates remaining unchanged in 40 years; The Sun pays £20 for a news in brief  —  The Sun pays from £10 for a picture used online and £20 for a print news in brief.

item.title: AIが生成した伝記は、しばしば重大な文法や事実誤認にまみれており、著名人の死後すぐにオンラインで販売されるようになっている（Elizabeth A Harris/New York Times）。
item.description:
Elizabeth A. Harris / New York Times:
AI-generated biographies, often riddled with gross grammatical and factual errors, are appearing for sale online soon after the death of well-known people  —  Books — often riddled with gross grammatical and factual errors — are appearing for sale online soon after the death of well-known people.

item.title: The Misinformation Combat AllianceとMetaは、インドのWhatsAppでファクトチェック専用のヘルプラインを立ち上げ、ユーザーがディープフェイクにフラグを立てて分析できるようにする計画だ（The Economic Times）。
item.description:
The Economic Times:
The Misinformation Combat Alliance and Meta plan to launch a dedicated fact-checking helpline on WhatsApp in India so users can flag deepfakes for analysis  —  The WhatsApp helpline will go live in March this year and will allow people to flag deepfakes by sending them to its chatbot.

item.title: NYTの発行人となったAG・サルツバーガー氏とのQ&A、記者であることの懐かしさ、2025年までに1500万人の購読者を獲得するというNYTの目標など（Eduardo Suárez/Reuters Institute）。
item.description:
Eduardo Suárez / Reuters Institute:
Q&A with AG Sulzberger on becoming the NYT publisher, what he misses about being a reporter, the NYT's goal of reaching 15M subscribers by 2025, and more  —  In this exclusive interview, he discusses his role in shaping the paper and preserving its values

item.title: ポーク賞：ニューヨーク・タイムズとプロパブリカがともに3部門受賞、バイス・ニュースがテレビ報道部門で受賞、ロイターがビジネス報道部門で受賞ほか（Samantha Chery/Washington Post）
item.description:
Samantha Chery / Washington Post:
Polk Awards: The New York Times and ProPublica both win three awards, Vice News wins for Television Reporting, Reuters wins for Business Reporting, and more  —  Now in its 75th year, the George Polk Awards for journalism honors stories from 2023 about wars in Ukraine and the Middle East …

item.title: 英国、"スパイ憲章 "にセーフガード追加で合意 スパイ機関はジャーナリズムの資料を探す前に独立審査を受けることを義務づけ（Bron Maher/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Bron Maher / Press Gazette:
The UK agrees to add safeguards to the “Snoopers' Charter”, requiring spy agencies to get an independent review before searching for journalistic material  —  Spy agencies will now need to secure independent review before searching for journalistic material.

item.title: Ofcom、英首相リシ・スナックのGB News「People's Forum」参加について公平性調査を開始、〜500件の苦情を受け（Naman Ramachandran/Variety）
item.description:
Naman Ramachandran / Variety:
Ofcom launches an impartiality investigation into UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak's participation on GB News' People's Forum, after receiving ~500 complaints  —  U.K. Prime Minister Rishi Sunak's participation on GB News' “People's Forum” last week is the subject of an impartiality investigation by the country's media regulator Ofcom.

item.title: 10/7プロジェクト」のような親イスラエル派グループが、イスラエルに偏っているとみなすWaPoのルイーザ・ラヴラックのようなジャーナリストの信用を失墜させようとする動きを見てみよう（Max Tani/Semafor）
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
A look at efforts by pro-Israel groups such as the 10/7 Project to discredit journalists like WaPo's Louisa Loveluck, who they deem to be biased against Israel  —  The Scoop  —  Pro-Israel groups, deeply critical of American news outlets such as the Washington Post over their coverage of the war in Gaza …

item.title: ガネットを含む米チェーン紙がいかにしてオールデンのようなPE企業に買収され、搾取されたかを詳述した新著『Hedged』について、マーゴット・ススカにQ&A（Jack Shafer/Politico）
item.description:
Jack Shafer / Politico:
Q&A with Margot Susca on her new book Hedged, which details how the US chain newspapers including Gannett were purchased and squeezed by PE firms like Alden  —  A journalism professor blames Wall Street for the newspaper industry's collapse.  —  The great American newspaper ain't what it used to be.

item.title: NYT記者としてニクソン大統領のカンボジア秘密爆撃作戦を暴露し、ピューリッツァー賞を受賞したウィリアム・ビーチャー氏が2月9日、90歳で死去した（Clay Risen/New York Times）。
item.description:
Clay Risen / New York Times:
William Beecher, who as a NYT reporter revealed President Nixon's secret bombing campaign over Cambodia and Pulitzer Prize winner, died on February 9 at age 90  —  His New York Times scoop enraged the Nixon White House, which ordered a tap on his phone.  He later won a Pulitzer Prize at The Boston Globe.
